reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Myself and my Fiancee have just returned from a couple of weeks in Crete, one of which was spent at the Sirios, which turned out to exceed our expectations.
reviews.title: Great - value / atmosphere / service / food / accommodation.

reviews.text: For what we paid, we were expecting something cheap and cheerful, with the usual crispy bread and rubbery cheese for breakfast, sullen, underpaid staff and an overpriced Bar.
reviews.title: Very good clean hotel

reviews.text: What we got was a very friendly hotel, that served excellent food, had a well equiped pool area, and very clean rooms.
reviews.title: MORE 2 STAR
You will love this place
reviews.text: It's also set back (approx 500m) from the main road, which means it's really peaceful (alot of the hotels in this area are built along the Rd - A road that's busy and so consequently noisey, 24hrs a day)

reviews.title: Good
reviews.text: Very popular with Scandanavians and Greeks, this is a great hotel for families.
